title: Add read operation wrappers to stores/comms.ts
description:
Add convenience wrapper functions to stores/comms.ts:

- fetchInfo(): Promise<InfoResponse>
- fetchTickDetails(id): Promise<TickDetail>
- fetchActivity(limit?): Promise<Activity[]>
- fetchRecord(tickId): Promise<RunRecord | null>
- fetchRunStatus(epicId): Promise<RunStatusResponse>
- fetchContext(epicId): Promise<string | null>

Each wrapper calls getCommsClient() and delegates to the client method.
Export these from stores/index.ts.
acceptance_criteria: Wrappers compile and are exported from stores/index.ts
closed_reason: Added 6 read operation wrappers to stores/comms.ts and exported from stores/index.ts
